column1: Maybe one day, she was thinking, her head and her hormones might agree over something ; and on that day the sun would rise and shine all morning, and fish would leap in the river, and all of her bills would turn out to be rebates.

column1: If I hadn't chucked away the rulebook shortly after Johannes Gutenburg invented printing, this would be the proper time for me to rise and shine.
